EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-10-20-October Partner Newsletter.July 2016 Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: October Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In This Issue:
- Partner Discount: Financial Services Sector
- Partner Town Hall Meeting
- BMC Partnership
Partner Discount: Financial Services Sector
Financial Services organizations face a unique set of challenges when it comes to managing their cloud and virtualized infrastructures, and Turbonomic is uniquely outfitted to help them get the most out of their existing investment and deliver the highest quality customer services to improve revenue, customer retention and overall reputation.
Until October 31st, partners who bring Turbonomic to a Financial Services prospect will receive an additional 15% discount on their Turbonomic transfer price. Simply register your opportunity in the Turbonomic Partner Portal to receive this offer. Click here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3786]]> for additional financial services specific collateral and information available in the Partner Portal. Partner Town Hall Meeting
Our upcoming Partner Town Hall Meeting will take place on November 15th, 2016 at 11 AM EST. Register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/turbonomic-2016-q4-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> to save your spot.
These Town Hall meetings are an opportunity to voice questions, concerns and feedback but also discuss the following topics:
- Vision Partner Summit: NYC - New! VDI Promotion - Upcoming Events - Q & A
Click here to register <[[https://turbonomic.com/turbonomic-2016-q4-partner-town-hall-meeting/]]> and stay informed about the various resources available to Partners and future initiatives to support the Partner community.
BMC and Turbonomic Partner
BMC and Turbonomic parter to accelerate digital business. Why did Turbonomic and BMC partner and what are the customer benefits to this partnership? Turbonomic CTO, Charles Crouchman, dives into details in his latest blog post <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/bmc-and-turbonomic-partner-to-accelerate-digital-business/]]>.
For more details, review the press release here <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/bmc-and-turbonomic-partner-to-deliver-agile-application-optimization/]]>. Welcome New Customers

Join the Green Circle
The Green Circle is our online community where you can access all resources, like training materials, industry insight, informative forums and make the most of your partnership with Turbonomic. Click here to join now » <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?inviteID=12005]]>

Questions?
If you have any questions please email us at partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>. We always appreciate your feedback so feel free to send us suggestions on how to improve our partner program or request resources that you would like to see.
